text: It is not so much for its beauty that the forest makes a claim upon men's hearts, as for that subtle something, that quality of air that emanation from old trees, that so wonderfully changes and renews a weary spirit.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

text: By plucking her petals, you do not gather the beauty of the flower.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

text: Beauty is the greatest seducer of man.
author: Paulo Coelho

text: I think permitting the game to become too physical takes away a little bit of the beauty.
author: John Wooden

text: Be sure what you want and be sure about yourself. Fashion is not just beauty, it's about good attitude. You have to believe in yourself and be strong.
author: Adriana Lima
